Orientation 2025 Links

Helpful links; 

MFA - Double check that you included a phone number:  

https://mysignins.microsoft.com/security-info

Let's check office - office.com

Install Google Chrome - https://www.google.com/chrome

Printing - https://print.sullivan.edu/ 

Blackboard - https://sullivan.blackboard.com/ 

Direct access to Panopto recordings (You can also access them through BlackBoard) - https://sullivan.hosted.panopto.com/

Install Adobe Acrobat Reader (This is free! Adobe Acrobat costs $, but you just need reader) - https://get.adobe.com/reader/

Sullivan Student Portal (You will not use this much) - http://secureportal.sullivan.edu/ 

Sullivan Drug Information Portal - https://libguides.sullivan.edu/SUCOPDIC

CORE Single Sign-One Page: https://corehighered.com/sso/sullivan
